Effects of Food
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Items: Effects of Food
By Dark Phoenix on Monday, May 15, 2000 - 03:55 am:

Well, after some break time I decided to finish my Food Effects List. This is meant to be a supplement to my item effect list. Refer to it to find out what the numbers mean. I have broken down the list to include what each of the foods do when liked, disliked or neutral. So here we go, here's what the Foods do:

Potato:
Liked: +1 Spoil, -1 Fear, -1 Form
Neutral: +4 Stress, -4 Spoil, +3 Fear, -1 Form
Disliked: +16 Stress, -10 Spoil, +4 Fear, -1 Form

Milk:
Liked: -3 Stress, +3 Spoil, +1 Form
Neutral: -2 Stress, +1 Spoil, -1 Fear, +1 Form
Disliked: +4 Stress, -4 Spoil, -4 Fear, +1 Form

Fish:
Liked: -6 Stress, +3 Spoil, +2 Form
Neutral: -3 Stress, +2 Spoil, +2 Form
Disliked: +2 Stress, -2 Spoil, +1 Fear, +2 Form

Cup Jelly:
Liked: -7 Stress, +1 Spoil, -3 Form
Neutral: -5 Stress, +1 Spoil, +1 Fear, -3 Form
Disliked: +1 Stress, -1 Spoil, +1 Fear, -3 Form

Meat:
Liked: -8 Stress, +5 Spoil, +5 Form
Neutral: -6 Stress, +4 Spoil, +6 Form
Disliked: +1 Spoil, +1 Fear +6 Form

Tablets:
Liked: -15 Stress, +3 Spoil, +2 Fear, +3 Form
Neutral: -13 Stress, +1 Spoil, +2 Fear, +3 Form
Disliked: -10 Stress, -1 Spoil, +2 Fear, +2 Form

Hopefully this can help you make decisions on what to feed your monsters. As you can see, what you feed it can make a big difference in your monster's welfare.

Good Luck!
